${ModID}:CeremonialRobe.NAME: Ceremonial Robe
${ModID}:CeremonialRobe.FLAVOR: Elegant, but difficult to fight in.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw !R! additional card each turn.  At the start of each combat, lose !R2! #yDexterity.

${ModID}:VestOfManyPockets.NAME: Vest Of Many Pockets
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat you may draw !R! card then discard !R! card.

${ModID}:GlowingNecklace.NAME: Glowing Necklace
${ModID}:GlowingNecklace.FLAVOR: It slowly pulls in mana from its surroundings.
DESCRIPTIONS: At end of combat, gain !R! charge.  Click to spend all charges, gaining !R! random buff per charge.

${ModID}:DarkClover.NAME: Dark Clover
${ModID}:DarkClover.FLAVOR: The unlucky version of the four leaf clover.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, for one turn, you deal !R! [${ModID}:ScourgeIcon] damage back when attacked.

${ModID}:SparkingWand.NAME: Sparking Wand
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat you may increase your #yResonance by !R!%.

${ModID}:TormentorsMask.NAME: Tormentor's Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they take !R! damage.

${ModID}:TuningFork.NAME: Tuning Fork
${ModID}:TuningFork.FLAVOR: It constantly makes a quiet hum.  It never ends.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you merge a #yResonant card into another, #yResonance increases by an additional !R!.

${ModID}:VialOfNectar.NAME: Vial of Nectar
${ModID}:VialOfNectar.FLAVOR: It's very thick, but tastes sweet.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !R! #yTemporary #yHP at the beginning of combat.

${ModID}:Mythril.NAME: Mythril
${ModID}:Mythril.FLAVOR: It's extremely hard for something so light.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have no cards in hand at end of turn, gain !R! #yBlock.

${ModID}:RegularBandages.NAME: Regular Bandages
${ModID}:RegularBandages.FLAVOR: They're the generic store bought version.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card, gain !R! #yBlock.

${ModID}:RandomRelic.NAME: Random Relic
${ModID}:RandomRelic.FLAVOR: It could be anything.  It could even be a boat.
DESCRIPTIONS: Granted one of four possible Arcanist starting relics, chosen at random.
